sense.def: ① EA, PM identical with ji zhi 積滯① , accumulation and sluggishness. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 6: 將適失宜，脾胃虛弱者，石勢結滯，乘於脾胃，致令脾胃氣不 和，不勝於穀，故氣逆而嘔 , “If the balance in nourishment is missed and the spleen and stomach are depleted and weak, the force of the mineral forms nodes and is sluggish , and avails itself of the spleen and stomach. This in turn causes an imbalance in the qi of the spleen and stomach which is no longer capable of transforming the grain. Hence the qi moves contrary to its regular direction and this results in vomiting”.

② Pathological Condition identical with ji zhi 積滯② , accumulation and sluggishness. Wai tai mi yao 外台秘要 38: 療熱氣結滯，經年數數發方 , “Recipe to heal nodular and sluggish heat qi which appears again and again over many years”.
